problem_names: lemma Aexp_subst_upd: "(Aexp e[y::=x]\<cdot>n) \<sqsubseteq> (Aexp e\<cdot>n)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)"
lemma Aexp_subst: "Aexp (e[y::=x])\<cdot>a \<sqsubseteq> env_delete y ((Aexp e)\<cdot>a) \<squnion> esing x\<cdot>(up\<cdot>0)"
lemma Aexp_Var_singleton: "esing x \<cdot> (up\<cdot>n) \<sqsubseteq> Aexp (Var x) \<cdot> n"
lemma fup_Aexp_Var: "esing x \<cdot> n \<sqsubseteq> fup\<cdot>(Aexp (Var x))\<cdot>n"

lemma Aheap_nonrec:
    assumes "nonrec \<Delta>"
    shows "Aexp e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq> Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a"
translations: lemma Aexp_subst_upd: "(Aexp e[y::=x]\<cdot>n) \<sqsubseteq> (Aexp e\<cdot>n)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] \<sqsubseteq> (\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)
    (y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] \<sqsubseteq> (\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)
    (y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)
have "Aexp e[y::=x]\<cdot>n f|`(-{x,y}) = Aexp e\<cdot>n f|` (-{x,y})"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] f|` (- {x, y}) =
    \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e f|` (- {x, y})
by (rule Aexp_subst_restr) auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] f|` (- {x, y}) =
  \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e f|` (- {x, y})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] \<sqsubseteq> (\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)

proof (prove)

 1. \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] \<sqsubseteq> (\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)
    (y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)
proof (rule fun_belowI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa.
       \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] xa \<sqsubseteq>
       ((\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)) xa
fix x'

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):

       \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] xa \<sqsubseteq>

have "x' = x \<or> x' = y \<or> x' \<in> (-{x,y})"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x' = x \<or> x' = y \<or> x' \<in> - {x, y}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa.
       \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e[y::=x] xa \<sqsubseteq>
       ((\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)) xa
thus "(Aexp e[y::=x]\<cdot>n) x' \<sqsubseteq> ((Aexp e\<cdot>n)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)) x'"
proof(elim disjE)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. x' = x \<Longrightarrow>

    ((\<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> e)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0)) x'
assume "x' \<in> (-{x,y})"

proof (state)
this:
  x' \<in> - {x, y}

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. x' = x \<Longrightarrow>

lemma Aexp_subst: "Aexp (e[y::=x])\<cdot>a \<sqsubseteq> env_delete y ((Aexp e)\<cdot>a) \<squnion> esing x\<cdot>(up\<cdot>0)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e[y::=x] \<sqsubseteq>
    env_delete y (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) \<squnion>
    esing x\<cdot>(up\<cdot>0)
apply (rule below_trans[OF Aexp_subst_upd])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0) \<sqsubseteq>
    env_delete y (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) \<squnion>
    esing x\<cdot>(up\<cdot>0)
apply (rule fun_belowI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa.
       ((\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e)(y := \<bottom>, x := up\<cdot>0))
        xa \<sqsubseteq>
       (env_delete y (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) \<squnion>
        esing x\<cdot>(up\<cdot>0))
        xa
apply auto

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
end

context ArityAnalysisSafe
begin
lemma Aexp_Var_singleton: "esing x \<cdot> (up\<cdot>n) \<sqsubseteq> Aexp (Var x) \<cdot> n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. esing x\<cdot>(up\<cdot>n) \<sqsubseteq> \<A>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> (Var x)
by (simp add: Aexp_Var)
lemma fup_Aexp_Var: "esing x \<cdot> n \<sqsubseteq> fup\<cdot>(Aexp (Var x))\<cdot>n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. esing x\<cdot>n \<sqsubseteq>
    \<A>\<^sup>\<bottom>\<^bsub>n\<^esub> (Var x)
by (cases n) (simp_all add: Aexp_Var)
end

context ArityAnalysisLetSafe
begin

lemma Aheap_nonrec:
    assumes "nonrec \<Delta>"
    shows "Aexp e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq> Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
have "ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion> Aexp e\<cdot>a \<sqsubseteq> Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion> Aexp (Let \<Delta> e)\<cdot>a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion>
    \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion>
    \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e)
by (rule Aexp_Let)

proof (state)
this:
  ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion>
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e \<sqsubseteq>
  Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion>
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
note env_restr_mono[where S = "domA \<Delta>", OF this]

proof (state)
this:
  (ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) f|`
  domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
  (Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e)) f|`
  domA \<Delta>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  (ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) f|`
  domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
  (Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e)) f|`
  domA \<Delta>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  nonrec \<Delta>
have "ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> = \<bottom>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  nonrec \<Delta>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> =
    \<bottom>
by (rule nonrecE) (auto simp add: fv_def fresh_def dest!: subsetD[OF fup_Aexp_edom])

proof (state)
this:
  ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> =
  \<bottom>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>

moreover

proof (state)
this:
  ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> =
  \<bottom>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>

have "Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> = Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> = Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
by (rule env_restr_useless[OF edom_Aheap])

proof (state)
this:
  Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> = Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>

proof (state)
this:
  Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> = Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a

have "(Aexp (Let \<Delta> e)\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> = \<bottom>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e) f|` domA \<Delta> =
    \<bottom>
by (auto dest!: subsetD[OF Aexp_edom])

proof (state)
this:
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e) f|` domA \<Delta> = \<bottom>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) f|`
  domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
  (Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e)) f|`
  domA \<Delta>
  ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> =
  \<bottom>
  Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> = Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e) f|` domA \<Delta> = \<bottom>
show "Aexp e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq> Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) f|`
  domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
  (Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a \<squnion>
   \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e)) f|`
  domA \<Delta>
  ABinds \<Delta>\<cdot>(Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a) f|` domA \<Delta> =
  \<bottom>
  Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a f|` domA \<Delta> = Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> (Terms.Let \<Delta> e) f|` domA \<Delta> = \<bottom>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
    Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a
by (simp add: env_restr_join)

proof (state)
this:
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e f|` domA \<Delta> \<sqsubseteq>
  Aheap \<Delta> e\<cdot>a

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
